data.actual_result: Clyde's message becomes lighter as if it's queued which causes you unsent message to go below Clyde's making it inconsistent with desktop.
data.expected_result: Clyde's message shouldn't be queued because it's a user side message and isn't sent by the user themself.
data.short_description: Clyde's message is lighter as compared to other message as if it's a queued message.
data.steps_to_repro: - DM a person who has blocked you or with whom you share no servers. - Observe Clyde's message.
